# Results

## Packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(geojsonio)
library(sp)
json_map <- geojson_read("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/alexjalali/remotelearningedav/main/School%20Districts.geojson", what = "sp")
```

## Try 1

```{r}
df <- read.csv(file='./datasets/DataClean.csv')
df_total <- subset(df, Category == "total")
ggplot(data = df_total, aes(y = Math_Scores_2019, x = District)) +
  geom_point() + xlab("District") + ylab("Average Math Scores in 2019") + ggtitle("Math scores by district") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(1, 32, 1))
```

## Plot from JSON

```{r}
plot(json_map, col = "grey")
```
